member.name: T:quotable.console.Program
member.summary: Runs the SimpleRandomQuoteProvider object in the console application. Takes in a user input, checks to see if it can be parsed as an integer, and if so calls returnQ which returns an array of strings.

member.name: M:quotable.console.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Testing the SimpleRandomQuoteProvider in a console app.
